_source: s;LadyJane;The battle has turned against us.|Send for my chariot.
s;Priest;A-ah are you sure?{w} Many of your experiments will be lost.

s;LadyJane;I have no choice.{w} The skill of their commander is...|Impressive.{w} Hah, truth be told, I would join him if I could.|But alas, we must start anew.{w} Somewhere else.|Somewhere more... hospitable.
s;Priest;I understand, milady.{w} I will send for our escape.
speak;Narrator;{v("turnLeeway")} turns from now, Lady Jane will retreat.|Surviving those turns will result in a victory.|However, additional awards are available if you approach her.;StyleNid=hint
